Indian Railways LHB upgrade, Indian Railways LHB coaches: Indian Railways (IR) is gradually phasing out older ICF (Integral Coach Factory) coaches and replacing them with modern LHB (Linke-Hofmann-Busch) coaches. The LHB coaches are modern, stainless steel passenger rail coach designed in Germany and manufactured in India.

What is LHB coach in train

The LHB coaches are equipped with enhanced safety features like anti-climbing devices and fire-retardant materials and have a higher operating speed of 160 kmph, with a design speed of up to 200 kmph, compared to the older 140 kmph ICF coaches.
